raw_body: AMARASEKERA – MRS KANTHI – Former teacher Samudradevi Balika Vidyalaya Nugegoda. Wife of late Nanda Amarasekera,​ beloved mother of Athula (Design Team 3,​ Singapore) & Preethi Wijeratne,​ cherished mother-in-law of Shyamali Pitigala,​ loving grandmother of Anisha & Ayushi Amarasekera & Eshana de Silva,​ daughter of late Mr and Mrs N.E. Perera of Talpitiya Wadduwa and daughter-in-law of late Mr and Mrs Don Simon Amarasekera of Kindelpitiya,​ Horana. Sister of late Dr N.P. Perera,​ late Kusuma Panditharatne,​ late Amara Anthonis,​ Nimal Dharmadasa,​ Sumathi Nawana and late N.T.S. Perera. Cortege leaves residence,​ 36,​ Chapel Lane,​ Nugegoda at 3 p.m. on Monday 15th January 2024 for cremation at General Cemetery,​ Kanatte at 4 p.m. (Old Crematorium). No flowers by request.003810
